name: Bubble trouble, but its 3D
description:
Like many of us, I grew up playing video games. Video games were something that helped me to escape reality and be completely drawn into a new one.

Particularly I grew up playing online flash games, you know, websites such as miniclip had so many different games to choose from. Few games that I used to play were games such as gravity guy, raft wars or zed. But one of my all-time favorite games was ‘bubble trouble’.

So I decided to make the my old favorite 'Bubble Trouble' game, in 3D instead!

All the copyright stuff goes to the original creator of the game : "Kresimir Cvitanovic"
